http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-29577 - TextArea does not autoscroll(cursor disappers) if TA height is specified

Restored the logic in TextAreaSkin for the case when the caret was at the end of the text. This ensures we call validateNow to resize the Group before setting the scroll position.

Fixed logic to compare the dimensions of the scrollable area and the element instead of comparing the top and bottom bounds.
